attributes.action: Use the Olympic park as a health , fitness and sport university
attributes.additional_details: We should turn the Olympic park into a health , fitness and sports university . This will keep the legacy of the games intact . Creating student places with sport education as a focus . It will create very much jobs for the area . A sports technology park could also be built adding to the site . In whole it would provide future athlete with word class training and education that to many would not be available . Courses would cover every aspect of sport , health and fitness from the manufacture and design of equipment through to the business and finance side . This is a golden opportunity to build something very special for the future youth of our country .
